dublinCore.dc:title: HR 3626 ENR: To extend the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 10 years.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday, the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen
form.official-title: To extend the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 10 years.

section.header: Extension of Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 10 years
section.text: Section 2(f)(2) of the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 (18 U.S.C. 922 note) is amended by striking 25 and inserting 35.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
